title: What is Elton John’s assumed middle name? - Quora

response.answer_text: It's Hercules. He got the idea from a well liked British comedy show from the 60's and 70's called steptoe and son. Hercules was the name of their horse. Most Brits, even younger ones will know of it through repeats. It's about a father and son who live together in a grubby house and they work as rag and bone men(kind of scavengers that ride around on a horse and cart ringing a bell and taking people's scrap metal and the like). Check it out on YouTube if you haven't seen it, I believe it was a bbc show and also had two feature films as spin off's during the 70's . Elton john seemed to have liked it

HerculesShortly before the release of his 1972 album Honky Chateau, Elton legally changed his name to Elton Hercules John. He reportedly chose "Hercules" as his middle name because it was the name of a horse on the old British sitcom Steptoe and Son.
